validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

dashboard.subtitle: Here's an overview of your cycling performance.
dashboard.completeProfilePrompt: Complete your athlete profile to get personalized AI analysis.
dashboard.setupProfilePrompt: Set up your profile for personalized analysis
dashboard.connectStrava: Connect Strava to import your activities

activities.title: Activities
activities.activitiesWillAppear: Your activities will appear here after syncing
activities.connectStravaPrompt: Connect your Strava account to automatically sync your rides

activitiesPage.title: Activities
activitiesPage.subtitle: Browse and analyze your synced Strava activities
activitiesPage.noActivities: No activities found. Sync your Strava account to see activities.

strava.connectDescription: Connect your Strava account to sync activities and analyze your performance
strava.tokenExpired: Token expired. Please disconnect and reconnect.
strava.ftpDetectionDescription: Analyze your power data to estimate FTP
strava.ftpDetected: FTP detected: {ftp}W and updated in profile
strava.connectionErrorDescription: Could not connect to Strava. Please try again.
strava.errorAccessDenied: Access was denied. Please try again and authorize the connection.
strava.errorInvalidScope: Missing permissions. Please try again and grant all requested permissions.
strava.errorDefault: Something went wrong. Please try again.

trainingPeaks.connectDescription: Connect your TrainingPeaks account to sync your training plans to your calendar
trainingPeaks.tokenExpired: Token expired. Please disconnect and reconnect.
trainingPeaks.premiumRequired: Note: TrainingPeaks Premium account required for workout sync
trainingPeaks.premiumRequiredForSync: TrainingPeaks Premium account required. Basic accounts cannot sync planned workouts.
trainingPeaks.syncInstructions: Once connected, you can sync your training plans to TrainingPeaks from any scheduled plan.
trainingPeaks.connectFirst: You need to connect your TrainingPeaks account before syncing workouts.
trainingPeaks.connectInstructions: Go to Settings > Integrations to connect your TrainingPeaks account.
trainingPeaks.syncSuccessDescription: Your workouts have been synced to TrainingPeaks.
trainingPeaks.syncPartialDescription: Some workouts could not be synced.
trainingPeaks.notSyncedTooltip: This plan has not been synced to TrainingPeaks

onboarding.title: Welcome! Let's set up your profile
onboarding.subtitle: This will only take a few minutes

step1.title: Basic Information
step1.subtitle: Tell us a bit about yourself

step2.title: Performance Metrics
step2.subtitle: Help us understand your fitness level
step2.ftpTooltip: FTP is the highest average power you can sustain for approximately one hour. If you don't know your FTP, you can skip this for now.
step2.maxHrPlaceholder: Enter your max HR in bpm
step2.maxHrTooltip: Your maximum heart rate is the highest heart rate you can achieve. If you don't know it, a rough estimate is 220 minus your age.
step2.maxHrDescription: Used for heart rate zones and training load calculations
step2.restingHrPlaceholder: Enter your resting HR in bpm
step2.restingHrDescription: Used for hrTSS calculation. Measure first thing in the morning.
step2.lthrDescription: Used for HR zone calculations in workout compliance analysis. Typically 95-105% of 30-min max HR.
step2.weightTooltip: Your current weight helps us calculate power-to-weight ratio and other metrics.
step2.skipAll: You can skip these for now and add them later

step3.title: Training Goals
step3.subtitle: What do you want to achieve?
step3.atLeastOneGoal: Please select at least one goal

profile.title: Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your athlete profile
profile.setupRequiredDescription: You haven't set up your athlete profile yet. Complete the setup to start tracking your cycling performance.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account settings
settings.appearanceDescription: Customize the look and feel of your app

integrations.stravaDescription: Sync activities, analyze performance, and auto-detect FTP from your Strava account
integrations.garminDescription: Import activities and health data directly from Garmin Connect
integrations.wahooDescription: Sync workouts and activities from Wahoo ELEMNT devices
integrations.trainingpeaksDescription: Sync your AI-generated training plans to your TrainingPeaks calendar
integrations.comingSoonMessage: This integration is currently in development. Check back soon for updates.
integrations.needDifferentDescription: We're constantly adding new integrations to help you get the most out of your training data. If you'd like to see a specific platform or device supported, let us know!

createPlan.title: Create Your Training Plan
createPlan.subtitle: Let's build a personalized training plan with AI-powered insights

goalStep.title: What's your main training goal?
goalStep.description: Choose the primary objective for your training plan. This will help us tailor workouts and progression to your specific needs.
goalStep.customGoalPlaceholder: E.g., 'I want to complete a 100-mile ride in under 5 hours' or 'Improve my climbing ability for mountain stages'
goalStep.customGoalHint: Our AI will analyze your custom goal and create a personalized plan.

improve-ftp.label: Improve FTP
improve-ftp.description: Increase functional threshold power through structured intervals

build-endurance.label: Build Endurance
build-endurance.description: Develop aerobic base for longer rides and events

race-prep.label: Race Preparation
race-prep.description: Peak for a specific event with targeted training

weight-loss.label: Weight Loss
weight-loss.description: Fat burning focused plan with zone 2 emphasis

general-fitness.label: General Fitness
general-fitness.description: Balanced approach to overall cycling fitness

timelineStep.title: What's your timeline?
timelineStep.description: Do you have a specific event to train for, or just a general timeframe?
timelineStep.hasEventQuestion: Do you have a target event?

profileStep.title: Your Athlete Profile
profileStep.description: We've pre-filled some information from your profile. Please review and update as needed.
profileStep.ftpSuggestion: Based on your recent activities, we suggest an FTP of {ftp}W.
profileStep.wkgExcellent: Excellent! You have a competitive power-to-weight ratio.
profileStep.wkgGood: Good power-to-weight ratio with room for improvement.
profileStep.wkgImprove: Focus on building power and optimizing weight for best results.
profileStep.maxHrHint: If unknown, estimate: 220 - your age = max HR
profileStep.trainingDaysDescription: Select which days you're available to train
profileStep.selectedDays: {count, plural, =0 {No days selected} =1 {1 day selected} other {# days selected}}

reviewStep.title: Review Your Training Plan
reviewStep.description: Please review all the details before generating your personalized training plan
reviewStep.planItem1: Personalized workout structure based on your {level} level
reviewStep.planItem3: {days} workouts per week with optimal recovery
reviewStep.planItem4: Power zones calculated from your {ftp}W FTP

aiAssistant.title: AI Coach
aiAssistant.description: Personalized guidance for your training plan
aiAssistant.noSuggestion: Complete the wizard steps to receive personalized recommendations...
aiAssistant.insightWkgExcellent: Excellent power-to-weight ratio! Your {wkg} W/kg puts you in the advanced category.
aiAssistant.insightWkgImprove: Your W/kg ratio has great room for improvement. A structured plan can help you reach new levels!
aiAssistant.insightFtpDays: FTP improvement typically requires 4-5 training days per week. Consider increasing training frequency for optimal results.
aiAssistant.insightFtpWeeks: FTP gains typically require 8-12 weeks. Consider extending your plan duration.
aiAssistant.insightGreatTimeline: Great timeline! This gives us plenty of time for proper periodization.

planStatus.title: Creating Your Training Plan
planStatus.subtitle: Our AI coach is building a personalized plan just for you
planStatus.pleaseWait: This usually takes 1-2 minutes. Feel free to browse while we work.
planStatus.inQueue: Your plan is in the queue and will start processing shortly.
planStatus.readyToView: Your personalized training plan is ready to view!
planStatus.somethingWentWrong: We couldn't generate your plan. Please try again.

trainingPlan.title: Training Plan
trainingPlan.noWorkoutsScheduled: No workouts scheduled yet. Add workouts to your plan to see them here.

schedule.title: My Schedule
schedule.subtitle: Your scheduled training plans
schedule.scheduleDescription: Select a start date for {planName}. The plan will be scheduled on your calendar.
schedule.noScheduledPlansDescription: Schedule a training plan template to start training.
schedule.cancelConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to cancel "{planName}"? This will remove it from your schedule. You can always schedule it again later.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: We couldn't load your schedule. Please try again.

reports.title: Performance Reports
reports.subtitle: Your AI-generated performance analysis reports
reports.allReportsSubtitle: Browse all your performance analysis reports
reports.noReportsDescription: Performance reports will appear here once generated.

hero.subtitle: We believe every cyclist deserves a world-class coach. That's why we built an AI that understands your data, knows your goals, and helps you ride faster, stronger, and smarter than ever before.

mission.title: Our Mission: Make You Unstoppable
mission.description: We're not just another training app. We're your tireless training partner that analyzes every pedal stroke, understands your physiology, and crafts personalized plans that evolve with you. Whether you're chasing your first century ride or hunting for that podium finish, we've got your back (and your watts).

features.title: Everything You Need to Level Up
features.subtitle: From data analysis to personalized training plans, we've packed everything a serious cyclist needs into one powerful platform.

aiCoach.title: AI-Powered Coaching
aiCoach.description: Get intelligent insights and recommendations based on your unique performance data. It's like having a pro coach in your pocket.

performanceAnalysis.title: Deep Performance Analysis
performanceAnalysis.description: Dive into your power curves, heart rate trends, and training patterns. Understand what makes you tick (and what makes you tick faster).

trainingPlans.title: Smart Training Plans
trainingPlans.description: Automatically generated plans that adapt to your goals, availability, and fitness level. No cookie-cutter workouts here.

powerZones.title: Precision Power Zones
powerZones.description: Train in the right zones at the right time. Our AI calculates your zones and tells you exactly when to push and when to recover.

tss.title: Training Stress Tracking
tss.description: Monitor your training load with TSS calculations. Know when you're building fitness and when you need rest before you burn out.

progress.title: Track Your Progress
progress.description: Watch your FTP climb, your endurance grow, and your times drop. Nothing motivates like seeing real progress.

philosophy.title: Built by Cyclists, for Cyclists
philosophy.paragraph1: We know what it's like to stare at a power file wondering what it all means. We've felt the frustration of plateaus and the joy of breakthroughs. That's why we built something different.
philosophy.paragraph2: Our AI doesn't just crunch numbers—it understands the art and science of cycling. It knows that a 5-hour endurance ride tells a different story than 5x5 VO2max intervals. It understands periodization, recovery, and what it takes to peak for your big event.
philosophy.paragraph3: This isn't artificial intelligence for the sake of buzzwords. This is a genuine training partner that gets smarter every time you ride.

team.title: A Team That Lives on Two Wheels
team.description: Behind every algorithm is a cyclist who's felt the burn of a threshold test, the freedom of a mountain descent, and the satisfaction of a perfectly executed training block. We build what we wish we had.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Riding?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of cyclists who are already training smarter, recovering better, and achieving goals they never thought possible.
